review: Phenergan (promethazine):I take this when my hay fever is really bad. Works amazingly well for relieving hay fever symptoms and also as a mild sleep aid. I suffer from anxiety and panic attacks and unfortunately this drug makes my anxiety 100% worse the next day, like I'm going to have a psychotic break or something. Disappointing as it works so well for sleep and hay fever.

Phenergan (promethazine):Phenergan made me so drowsy waking up felt like being hit by a truck. I fell asleep 2 - 3 times at the wheel in the mornings driving to work after I took this. I would never take it again.

Phenergan (promethazine):It worked to help me sleep every time I tried except once. Also is great if you are sick to your stomach. I have never used it for allergies, but I want to. Try it if your Doctor lets you.
